scheme_name: Saraswati Sadhana Yojana to Economically Backward Class Girls studying in Class 9
brief_description: Under this scheme, free bicycle assistance is provided to economically backward class girls studying in Class 9 in government and grant-in-aid schools across Gujarat.
detailed_description: The &quot;Saraswati Sadhana Yojana to Economically Backward Class Girls studying in Class 9&quot; is a welfare scheme by the Social Justice and Empowerment Department of Gujarat. The scheme offers free bicycles to girls enrolled in Class 9 in government and grant-in-aided schools, facilitating easier access to education and encouraging regular school attendance. This physical aid helps in improving educational participation and empowering female students from economically weaker backgrounds.
benefits: Free bicycle provided to each eligible girl student.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must be a permanent resident of Gujarat. The applicant must be a female student. The applicant must be studying in Class 9. The applicant must be enrolled in a government or grant-in-aided school in Gujarat. The applicant must belong to the Economically Weaker Section (EWS). The applicant's family income must not exceed ₹6,00,000 per annum.

steps: Registration Process:
Step 1: Visit the official website: www.digitalgujarat.gov.in
Step 2: Click on the "Register" button on the homepage.
Step 3: You will be redirected to the registration form page.
Step 4: Fill in the required details such as: Name, Email ID, Mobile Number, Password, etc.
Step 5: Submit the registration form to create your account.
Log In Process:
Step 1: Go to www.digitalgujarat.gov.in
Step 2: Click on the "Login" button.
Step 3: Select the suitable login option (e.g., Citizen Login).
Step 4: You will be redirected to the login form page.
Step 5: Enter your registered Email ID/Mobile Number and Password.
Step 6: Click Login to access your account.
Apply for a New Service:
Step 1: Log in to the portal using your registered credentials.
Step 2: After login, your user profile will appear showing all previously taken services.
Step 3: Click on "Request a New Service" or the relevant option.
Step 4: You will be redirected to a list of services.
Step 5: Select the desired service from the list.
Step 6: Click "Continue to Service".
Step 7: A form will open—fill in all the required information.
Step 8: (Optional) Click to auto-fill details from your profile.
Step 9: Click "Next" after completing each section.
Step 10: Upload/attach the necessary documents or import them via DigiLocker.
Step 11: Review all information and click "Submit" to complete the application.

documents_required: Aadhaar Card. Birth Certificate. Caste Certificate. Identity Card. Income Certificate. Mark sheet.
